Text: Hagwon (] ) is the Korean-language word for a for-profit private institute, academy or cram school prevalent in South Korea.

Text: Hagwon:  Hagwon also play a social role, and many children, especially the younger ones, say they like going to hagwon because they are able to make new friends; many children ask to be sent because their friends attend.
Triplets:<Hagwon

Text: Hagwon:  There are many hagwon for adults too, such as flower arrangement and driving-license hagwon.
